item.title: Levi Leipheimer wins!
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: Levi Leipheimer wins the Tour of Germany, beating the favorite, Jan Ullrich. Levi placed 6th in the Tour de France this year.

wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
Troy,
Forgive me for posting directly on your site, but I had difficulty finding your email. I figured I would share a little story with you . . . and as a big time Levi L. fan . . . this would be the best place!
Anyways, I was searching online for a chicken salad recipe and printed out one that was highly reviewed. Walking back from the printer, I look at the name . . . Troy Hakela . . . sounded familiar so I called my wife and discovered that you are a long time family friend! Anyways, I look forward to the recipe and meeting you sometime. Your last name was definately fresh in my head due to Bonnie's mom calling recently and telling me that we needed to get some things out of their closet because the Hackelas were coming to visit them.
Cheers!
Steve Gurney
